title: Blanket, "Sampler Blanket #3", 2004
medium:
Medium: wool, polyester
Technique: needle punched wool and wool applique with machine embroidery
description: Dark brown background with bands of taupe and rose at the bottom.  In the center, a group of cutout "paper doll" figures in pink plaid.  In the lower left, a red patterned butterfly.
